headline: Michigan winter temperatures expected to drive up energy use
summary: DTE Energy is connecting its customers to resources and information to help them manage use and keep bills affordableDETROIT, Nov. 01, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Forecasts for the coming winter suggest temperatures may not dip as low as in recent years, but energy use is still expected to increase as it does each winter. DTE Energy is reaching out to customers to share tips on managing use and getting assistance if they’re having trouble paying bills. This effort comes just after DTE earned the to
